categoriesExplanation: The workout is classified primarily as 'Indoor rowing' due to the title 'Sweet Spot Row', which clearly indicates a rowing-focused session. The confidence level is high (0.8) due to explicit references to rowing and structured intervals, though not absolute due to slight ambiguity in music and the general use of 'sweat' which can be broadly applied.
